Where can I get this Bubblesort header file? 
I do not see the same problem ... I see an NPE deep inside the symbol table 
when parsing iostream due to some of andrew's template magic, but other than 
that the file opens.  

Note that open declaration on a namespace is not the best thing to do since 
namespaces are defined over and over again throughout the source, and it is 
impossible to pick the right one to goto.

I do not see the NPE anymore. 
Please confirm/deny.  

I do see a couple of deficiencies with the feature though: 
A) Since namespaces are defined multiple times, you only navigate to the first 
one.  
B) Since the namespace is first defined (in my case anyway) in the header file 
clocale, which is extensionless, the current implementation does not open the 
CEditor upon it, rather the text editor, which does not navigate to the right 
place since it gets opened by the external editor which we cannot control as 
well.  

Defect remains assigned until I figure out how the feature is meant to 
work ...

Ping Mathieu ...
